onyomiExamples.meaning: answer a roll call for another

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to return (something), to restore, to put back, to turn over, to turn upside down, to overturn, to pay back, to retaliate, to reciprocate, to respond (with), to retort, to reply, to say back, to do ... back (e.g. speak back, throw back), to do again, to do repeatedly
attacking one opponent then immediately attacking another
to return, to come back, to go back, to turn over, to become extremely, to become completely
